Russia: Battle of the Kalka River: The warriors of Rus' first encountered the Mongol armies of Genghis Khan.
Philippine: Tondo expands its territories southward towards Bicolandia in the leadership of Rajah Alon.
Malta: The exile to Malta of the entire male population of the town of Celano (Italy).
France: Philip II died. He was succeeded by his son Louis VIII, the Lion.
Estonia: Estonians defeat the Sword Brothers in the Battle of Viljandi and the entire Southern Estonia is liberated.
Estonians are defeated by Sword Brothers in Ümera, Latvia.
Pskov and Novgorod troops raid most of mainland Estonia.
China: Shenzong abdicated in favor of his son Emperor Xianzong of Western Xia.
